summary: The module offers a set of utilities to transform GLIGEN model checkpoints—including UNet, VAE, and OpenCLIP components—into the Hugging Face Diffusers format, generating appropriate configurations, renaming checkpoint keys, and assembling the converted components into ready‑to‑use diffusion pipelines.
business_intent: Facilitate the migration of GLIGEN‑based diffusion models to the Diffusers ecosystem, allowing developers and researchers to deploy, fine‑tune, and serve these models with the standard Diffusers API.
